RT @eraseresk: @broughy @EdinOldTownCC @jomowat @Edinburgh_CC This is Edinburgh Old Town. This isn't a city centre any more. It's a tourist…

@eraseresk @EdinOldTownCC @jomowat @Edinburgh_CC Surely it's their land? It's such a same something can't be done by others saying it's not us! Terrible something that should be simple to fix makes you and others want to pack up and move :-(
@eraseresk @EdinOldTownCC @jomowat @Edinburgh_CC Time to tackle the Church then!

@eraseresk @EdinOldTownCC @jomowat Thats just not on sure the Church should take a look at what it allows in its grounds. They should take action I would hope. The simple answer would be lock the gates earlier so you can at least get some peace or for the Council to take action.

@eraseresk @EdinOldTownCC Cllr @jomowat took a look at noise issues when ‘Message from Skies’ was on (its was loud btw) so is this is another example of having to put up with stuff for tourists over locals? Its also so inappropriate in a graveyard. Even one made famous by a wee dug. Hope Jo can sort.
